description: Trade Agreement: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid Competitive Procurement Strategy: Best Overall Proposal Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: Yes Nature of Requirements: Temporary Help Services
full_summary:
### Participation Request for Temporary Help Services (#EZ156-220001/D)
#### Tender Announcement

* **Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)**
* **Publication Date:** October 31, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 16, 2022, 17:00 hours (Eastern Standard Time)

**Background:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites proposals for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) to provide temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies. The geographical areas for service delivery are Yukon and British Columbia. This project includes a voluntary set-aside for Aboriginal businesses.

**Key Requirements:**

* Temporary help services for administrative, professional, technical, and telecommunications support
* Services will be delivered on an as-and-when-requested basis, with potential clients listed in Annex "A" of the Statement of Work
* Offerors must demonstrate a fully operational, permanent commercial office in one of the required provinces (Yukon, British Columbia)
* Service delivery must be available on a minimum of 7.5 hours per day, excluding statutory holidays
* Offerors must provide a minimum of 2 full-time employees working in the office location

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. Mandatory technical criteria must be met, and point-rated criteria will be evaluated for greening, accessibility, and social commitments. The voluntary set-aside for Aboriginal businesses will be implemented under the Federal Government's Procurement Strategy for Aboriginal Business.

**Submission Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit proposals electronically using the CSP Connect application
* Proposals must be in PDF format
* All documentation must be provided in either English or French

**Additional Information:**

* Interested parties can obtain additional information by contacting the Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC) generic email address.
* Bidders must submit proposals by the specified closing date to be considered for evaluation. 

**Address and Contact Information:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC)
11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

Phone: (604) 671-2613
Fax: (604) 775-7526
Email: Thomas.Leboeuf@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
**Notice URL: Not Applicable**
Attachments: The Basis of Standing Offer (
